import React, { useState } from 'react' import { AddRounded, Favorite, StarRounded } from '@mui/icons-material' function ItemCard({ imgSrc, name, ratings, price }) { const [isFavourite, setIsFavourite] = useState(false); return (
setIsFavourite(!isFavourite)} >

{name}

{/* Metódo para as avaliações (uma matriz) */} {Array.apply(null, { length: 5 }).map((element, index) => ( ))}

$ {price}

) } export default ItemCard
